content: LONDON, May 6 (Reuters) - British police arrested Graham Smith, leader of an anti-monarchist group Republic, ahead of King Charles' coronation on Saturday, a spokesperson for the group said.

Police did not confirm the arrest, saying they did not immediately name those arrested.A photo posted on Twitter showed Smith sitting on the ground surrounded by a group of police officers. An officer at the scene said three republican protesters had been arrested.(Reporting by Andrew MacAskill, writing by Sarah Young; editing by Michael Holden)
